thread.title: prefer to remain private
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by prefer to remain private

author: prefer to remain private
title: prefer to remain private
text: We rented based on the online pictures and the condo was lovely, well equipped and comfortable. Rental issues were clearly delineated in the contract and payments hit the credit card on-time or late (better for me!), We had only one small issue and it was addressed quickly. I like the safety of renting through an organization rather than VRBO (my sister has had 2 cancellations of her rental less than a week before her vacation start date). I also like the way pick up and drop off of the keys is handled - makes it easier if we are running late since we drive.
